blurbs.text: Arizona improved 6 spots in @taxfoundation's corp tax rankings after a phasedown to 4.9% corp rate
Local sales tax hikes made California less competitive in @taxfoundation's 2018 sales tax rankings
Ranked 48th on @taxfoundation's 2018 Index, California's tax system is volatile due to progressivity
Illinois's corp income tax hike (7.75-9.5%) helped drop it 6 places in @taxfoundation 2018 rankings
Kansas added new income tax bracket, 5.2% top rate, slipping 3 places on @taxfoundation's 2018 Index
New Mexico's cont'd corp tax cuts improved state 1 place on @taxfoundation's 2018 corp tax rankings
NC lowered it's individual income tax to 5.499%, improving its ranking on @taxfoundation 2018 Index
NC lowered it's corp income tax to 3%, improving its corp tax ranking on @taxfoundation's 2018 Index
Rhode Island unemp. insur. tax reform drove their UI ranking from 50th to 23rd on @taxfoundation's 2018 Index
Cont'd tax reform, including a corp rate cut, improved DC 2 places on @taxfoundation 2018 corp tax rankings
Oregon is 10th on @taxfoundation rankings, but recent gross receipts tax proposals could change that
Virginia has low taxes, but a poorly structured system, ranking 31st on @taxfoundation's 2018 Index
Texas is a low tax state, ranks 13th on @taxfoundation 2018 Index, but its "Margin Tax" holds it back
Arkansas only ranks 39th on @taxfoundation's 2018 Index, but has the opportunity for real
Connecticut ranks 44th on @taxfoundation's 2018 Index, faces major budget issues. It's time for real
Ohio is 47th on corp taxes on @taxfoundation's 2018 Index due to destructive Commerical Activity Tax
Pennsylvania ranks 26 on @taxfoundation 2018 Index, but faces big budget issues. It's time for real
